description: My name is Gray, just like the color! I am a creative professional passionate about art direction. The process of translating a concept from a written strategy to actualizing it as a physical entity brings me life. With an MFA from Carnegie Mellon University and a BFA from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill, my formal training as an artist and over eight years of experience in art direction shape the way that I engineer sentiment. Like any great work of art, an ad campaign has the capacity to tell many stories, but it must elicit a visceral response, one that both captivates and stimulates the potential consumer. A brand identity must be constructed so that the outwardly performed visual identity is true to the brandâ€™s heart and soul.
